text: An alien has kidnapped Matt Damon, not knowing what lengths humanity goes through to retrieve him whenever he goes missing.

An alien has kidnapped Matt Damon, not knowing what lengths humanity goes through to retrieve him whenever he goes missing. Little did the aliens know that Matt Damon is the president and the world would do anything to get him back safe and sound. 

Now these aliens are smart but not so much smarter than us so humanity has a chance.

Now these aliens are smart but not so much smarter than us so humanity has a chance. But they have one advantage over us.

Now these aliens are smart but not so much smarter than us so humanity has a chance. They are strong but the military has a tracker on Matt just in case of situations like this.

Now these aliens are smart but not so much smarter than us so humanity has a chance.  The aliens are not so much stronger than us, we have a few tricks up our sleeves. Matt has a tracker on him for situations like this. The military knows at all times where Matt is. Currently they have him in Antarctica because that was the aliens hideout. The military knows this and begins gathering all they can and enlisting the helps of other countries military for an all out war to save President Damon.

The aliens are oblivious to who they have in their possession. They took President Damon to experiment on him. They get out their alien weapons to go on the offensive as well.

He looks for the door and spots the military and the aliens troops fighting. He runs out the door and is spotted by the military. But he has to be careful. He is not clear yet. The military need to get passed the alien line and President Damon needs to not be seen. He is equipped but it's a matter of time before he is spotted. The military makes a plan. They send out a land rover. They will get one with the machine gun on top and try to drive and extract President Damon. 

They drive the rover in order to get President Damon while mowing down aliens. But suddenly the gunner is shot leaving no one on the gun. But they make it to President Damon. He has to shoot a few aliens but makes it inside the rover. Courageously President Damon takes over the gunner and mows down the aliens. He gets a higher kill count that the previous gunner! The rover makes it back safely to the shore where President Damon is extracted and makes it safely back to the ship. He leaves behind the rest of the military to fight.
